tool_description: This is an API which extracts news/article body from a URL and uses GPT to summarize (and optionally translate) the article content. Useful for text mining purposes. Leverages powerful and flexible web scraping engine (ScrapeNinja.net) with high-quality rotating proxies under the hood. In depth review and API implementation details: https://pixeljets.com/blog/gpt-summary-is-broken/ . My video where ChatGPT summary capabilities are explored: https://youtu.be/hRQqJtgYz_Q
title: Article Extractor and Summarizer

api_list.name: /summarize
api_list.description: Summarizes the article after extracting it from the specified url.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Target language to translate summary into

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: pass TRUE if you want to convert new line symbols in API response text with html paragraph tags

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length in paragraphs. This parameter might be ignored for a very long articles.

utterances.utterance: Can you summarize the article from https://time.com/6266679/musk-ai-open-letter/ for me?
Please extract and summarize the content from https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-56580728.
Summarize the article at https://www.nytimes.com/2023/04/01/technology/elon-musk-twitter.html and translate it to Spanish.
I need a brief summary of the article from https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2023/apr/01/elon-musk-twitter-ai.
Could you summarize the article at https://www.cnn.com/2023/04/01/tech/elon-musk-twitter-ai/index.html in French?
Get me a summary of the article from https://www.forbes.com/sites/johnkoetsier/2023/04/01/elon-musk-twitter-ai/ with HTML formatting.
Can you provide a summary of the article at https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2023/04/01/elon-musk-twitter-ai/ in German?
Please summarize the article from https://www.reuters.com/technology/elon-musk-twitter-ai-2023-04-01/ in 5 paragraphs.
Extract and summarize the content from https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-04-01/elon-musk-twitter-ai with a length of 2 paragraphs.
I need a summary of the article at https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/elon-musk-twitter-ai-rcna123456 with HTML tags.

api_list.name: /extract
api_list.description: Extract an article body and markdown version of the body.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
